name: AddImageToMiroBoard
description:
Add an image to a Miro board using a URL.

This tool is used to add an image to a specific Miro board by providing an image URL. It requires the 'boards:write' scope for authorization. Ideal for users who want to enhance their Miro boards with visual content by specifying image links.

parameters.name: board_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the board where the image will be added.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to create the item.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL of the image to be added to the Miro board.

parameters.name: image_title
parameters.description: A short text header to identify the image on the Miro board.

value_schema.description: A short text header to identify the image.

parameters.name: x_axis_coordinate
parameters.description: X-axis coordinate for the image location on the Miro board. Center is at x: 0. Default is 0.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: y_axis_coordinate
parameters.description: Y-axis coordinate of the item's location on the board. Default is 0, centered on the board.

value_schema.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: image_height_pixels
parameters.description: Height of the image in pixels to be added to the Miro board.

value_schema.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: image_width_pixels
parameters.description: The width of the image in pixels to be added to the board.

value_schema.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: rotation_angle_degrees
parameters.description: Rotation angle of the image, in degrees, relative to the board. Use positive for clockwise and negative for counterclockwise.

value_schema.description: Rotation angle of an item, in degrees, relative to the board. You can rotate items clockwise (right) and counterclockwise (left) by specifying positive and negative values, respectively.

parameters.name: parent_frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the parent frame where the image will be added. Use this to specify a frame within the board if needed.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to create the item.

By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

value_schema.description:

By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

value_schema.description: Height of the item, in pixels.
